content: Many old Macs are still in use, one reason is that Macs traditionally have been built more upgradable than were Wintel boxes. Not counting the CRTs, I spent about $600 for the upgrades (about the same as it cost for a Macmini with one Gig of RAM) averaging about $60/year.
